thread.title: Kashmir: 4 militants, 2 army jawans killed in Kulgam encounter
thread.title_full: Kashmir: 4 militants, 2 army jawans killed in Kulgam encounter

title: Kashmir: 4 militants, 2 army jawans killed in Kulgam encounter
text:
Kashmir: 4 militants, 2 army jawans killed in Kulgam encounter Kashmir: 4 militants, 2 army jawans killed in Kulgam encounter Acting on a tip-off by police, army cordoned off a village in Kulgam, 60 km from Srinagar. By: PTI | Srinagar | Published:February 12, 2017 10:43 am 
Two army jawans and four militants were killed in an encounter early this morning in Frisal area of south Kashmir’s Kulgam district. Acting on a tip-off by police, army cordoned off a village in Kulgam, 60 km from Srinagar. 
Three other militants, believed to be severely injured during the gunfight, managed to escape. Hunt is on to nab them, sources said. 
An encounter broke out this morning in Frisal area after security forces launched the cordon and search operation, a police official said, adding the operation was still on.
